payload.headline: Apple Accidentally Exposes Top-Secret Hardware Plans Across Seven Product Lines
payload.summary: Apple unintentionally revealed information about its future products, with the details discovered in the company's publicly available software code.

payload.headline: Consumer Tech News (August 11–August 15): Consumer Sentiment Slips, Stimulus Sparks Rallies, and Cisco & Applied Materials Headline Earnings
payload.summary: Consumer Tech News (Aug 11–15): Earnings season winds down as sentiment slips, China stimulus lifts markets, and Cisco & Applied Materials shine amid volatile macro conditions.

payload.headline: David Tepper's Hedge Fund Bets On Intel, UnitedHealth; Cuts Position In Four Mag 7 Stocks
payload.summary: David Tepper sold casino stocks and bought airline stocks in the second quarter. Here's a look at the changes made to the Appaloosa hedge fund.

payload.headline: Xi Jinping Is 'Difficult To Deal' With, Says Treasury Secretary; S&P 500 Earnings Beat, Chinese Stocks Jolt From Trump Moves — Weekly Economics Recap
payload.summary: Markets hit new highs, stablecoins reshape global finance, and China stimulus lifts stocks as U.S. earnings continue to beat expectations.
